pr_title: [WFCORE-5023] A few tests don't work using IBM JDK because of mock-server 5.9.0

timeline.bodyText:
Is the BC upgrade needed for the tests to pass with mockserver-netty 5.8.1?
Emmanuel has a PR that will update the org.bouncycastle version:
#4095
timeline.author: fjuma

replies.bodyText: The version upgrade is not needed, but it's needed the movement of BC to the main pom.xml (which is also done in the other PR). Checking the other PR maybe it's better if we wait until that PR is merged and work over it. I think with that PR I just need to downgrade the version of the mock-server and add BC to the  testsuite/standalone/pom.xml.
replies.author: rmartinc

replies.bodyText: @rmartinc The referenced PR has now been merged, I am going to mark this as needing a rebase for the steps you mentioned.
replies.author: darranl

replies.bodyText: OK, I rebased and did the same with the new poms. The mock-server is downgraded and BC is added in the two places the mock-server is used (now using the version managed by the main pom). Let's see the tests...
replies.author: rmartinc

replies.bodyText: @darranl @fjuma It is rebased and all the tests pass now. QA found the same in https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-5060 (the new one is a duplicate, I'm asking to close it).
replies.author: rmartinc
